extendedInfo.description: Net Manager is a powerful and easy application specifically designed to make your life easy and also extend the battery life of your Android device.I have tried a lot of connectivity managers and power saver applications, but found some off them too complex and some of them not applied to my simple requirements. Therefore i have decided to make one for myself, and glad to share it with you.Net Manager has following features:- Fully control on wifi and mobile data based on Screen On / Screen Off / Screen Unlock / Airplane mode / On Call and Schedule.- Automatically disable connection on screen-off after specified seconds or until all connection activities finished.- Automatically enable connection on screen unlock or screen on after specified seconds.- Automatically disable mobile data when WiFi is connected.- Configurable periodic reconnection to allow notifications.- Run in foreground: always show app icon in the notification bar (optional).- Airplane mode: automatically enable/disable reconnections at specified times.- Easy and clean interface.- Lightweight and fast app.------ Attention! ------This is 4 days trial version. Full version of Net Manager is available at:http://goo.gl/xQOi6I hope you will enjoy using it. Any feedback is welcome.Keywords: 3G, Wifi, Night mode, Network, Net, Mobile Data, Battery, Saver, Savior, Boost, Save, Drain, Juice Defender, Battery Booster, Easy.
